element_text:
{"chunk": "Transaktioner i fremmed valuta er i årets løb omregnet til
transaktionsdagens kurs. Hvis valutapositioner anses for
sikring af fremtidige pengestrømme, indregnes
værdireguleringerne direkte på egenkapitalen.
During the year, transactions in foreign currencies have
been translated applying the exchange rate at the
transaction date. If currency positions are considered", "context": "The chunk describes the company's policy for accounting for transactions in foreign currencies, which is part of the summary of significant accounting policies section of the annual report."}
